5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Samurah bin Jundab that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) described the likeness of Friday, saying that those who come earliest are like the one who sacrifices a camel, then like one who sacrifices a cow, then like one who sacrifices a sheep, until he made mention of a chicken

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّهْجِيرِ إِلَى الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about setting out early for Friday
